description: Aegislash (ギルガルド), the Royal Sword Pokémon, gains a shield when it evolves from Doublade. Its new ability Stance Change changes its forms in battle, switching from the attack-oriented Blade Forme (ブレードフォルム) to the defense-oriented Shield Forme (シールドフォルム) depending on the move used, such as its new King`s Shield move.
name: Gillgard
